elements.name: User log in with correct username and password

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user verifies that sign in page is visible
user enters "team87inci" username and "1Finci." password
user clicks on sign in page sign in button
close the application

elements.name: User always logs in with existing credentials

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user verifies that sign in page is visible
user enters "team87inci" username and "1Finci." password
user verifies remember me check box is clickable
close the application

elements.name: User updates password with did you forget your password option

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user verifies that sign in page is visible
user enters "team87inci" as username
user clicks on Did you forget your password text box
user enters "team87inci@gmail.com" address
user clicks Reset password button
user verifies Alert check your email for details on how to reset your password
close the application

elements.name: User registers with not registered yet option

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user verifies that sign in page is visible
user verifies You don't have an account yet? Register a new account is visible
user clicks on register new account
user verifies that Registration page is visible
close the application

elements.name: User log in with correct username and password

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user enters "team87inci" username and "1Finci." password
user verifies that cancel button is enable
user clicks cancel button
close the application

elements.name: User log in with wrong username and password

steps.name: user navigates to url
user clicks on account dropdown
user clicks on sign in button
user verifies that sign in page is visible
user enters "team87inc" username and "1Finci" password
user clicks on sign in page sign in button
Verify that Authentication information not correct  is displayed
close the application

name: Login page should be accessible only with valid credentials

steps.name: user is on the login page
user clicks on login dropdown icon
user clicks on sign in dropdown
user sends username "<username>"
user sends password "<password>"
user clicks on the sign in dropdown
user verifies the login is successful
user clicks on login dropdown icon
Doctor navigates to My Pages Dropdown
Doctor clicks on My Appointments Button
Doctor selects Appointment date from and to boxes
Doctor clicks on Edit Button
Doctor verifies patient's info id, start and end date, status, physician are visible
Doctor should fills in required fields, anemnesis, treatment, diagnosis which as required fields
Doctor should fills in optional fields precription and description Which as optional fields
Doctor can be select as PENDING, COMPLETED or CANCELLED at Status Dropdown
Doctor ckicks on Save Button
Doctor verifies Appointment is updated succesfully
Doctor clicks Sign Out Button
Doctor close the application
user is on the login page
user clicks on login dropdown icon
user clicks on sign in dropdown
user sends username "<username>"
user sends password "<password>"
user clicks on the sign in dropdown
user verifies the login is successful
user clicks on login dropdown icon
Doctor navigates to My Pages Dropdown
Doctor clicks on My Appointments Button
Doctor selects Appointment date from and to boxes
Doctor clicks on Edit Button
Doctor leaves anamesis field blank
